participant_1.background: i am a party animal. my favorite movie is mean girls. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.background: i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book.

content.text: hello, how are you today? i am well.
do you like movies? i like mean girls.
